caption: On the island in the middle of a lava lake, there stands a castle. The castle is connected to the outside world by a suspension bridge over the molten lava. The green monster and a donkey make their way across the suspension bridge towards the castle. They enter the castle through a covered walkway. Inside the castle, it's incredibly eerie, with various skeletons scattered around. The green monster picks up a suit of armor and puts it on. Suddenly, flames erupt as a massive dragon emerges from a hidden doorway. It starts chasing the monster and the donkey relentlessly. The donkey is driven to a desperate situation. Wearing the armor, the green monster enters a room in the castle where a woman in green clothing is seated on a bed. With a torch in hand, the armored monster escorts the woman out of the room. He uses her handkerchief to wipe his nose.
